languages.text: "Ты не хочешь вернуться к семье? Позаботиться о том, чтобы Версериан больше не становились жертвой наветов?"
"Don't you wish to return to your family? To make sure the Werserians do not fall victim to any further accusations?"
languages.original_text: "Ты не хочешь вернуться к семье? Позаботиться о том, чтобы Версериан больше не становились жертвой наветов?"

traits.locale_text: "Don't you wish to return to your family? To make sure the Werserians do not fall victim to any further accusations?"
"Don't you wish to return to your family? To make sure the Werserians do not fall victim to any further accusations?"
"Don't you wish to return to your family? To make sure the Werserians do not fall victim to any further accusations?"
"Don't you wish to return to your family? To make sure the Werserians do not fall victim to any further accusations?"

languages.text: «¿No le gustaría volver con su familia? ¿Asegurarse de que los Werserian no sean víctimas de más acusaciones?».
languages.original_text: "Don't you wish to return to your family? To make sure the Werserians do not fall victim to any further accusations?"

traits.locale_text: «¿No le gustaría volver con su familia? ¿Asegurarse de que los Werserian no sean víctimas de más acusaciones?».

languages.text: 「家族の元に帰りたいと思わないか？ ウェルザリアン家がこれ以上、非難を浴びないためにも」
languages.original_text: "Don't you wish to return to your family? To make sure the Werserians do not fall victim to any further accusations?"

traits.locale_text: 「家族の元に帰りたいと思わないか？ ウェルザリアン家がこれ以上、非難を浴びないためにも」

languages.text: “你就不想回到你的家人身边吗？不想保护好韦尔森家族，让它今后免受诬告与谣言所害吗？”
languages.original_text: "Don't you wish to return to your family? To make sure the Werserians do not fall victim to any further accusations?"

traits.locale_text: “你就不想回到你的家人身边吗？不想保护好韦尔森家族，让它今后免受诬告与谣言所害吗？”

languages.text: « Ne souhaitez-vous pas retourner auprès de votre famille pour veiller à ce que les Werserian ne soient pas victimes de nouvelles accusations ? »
languages.original_text: "Don't you wish to return to your family? To make sure the Werserians do not fall victim to any further accusations?"

traits.locale_text: « Ne souhaitez-vous pas retourner auprès de votre famille pour veiller à ce que les Werserian ne soient pas victimes de nouvelles accusations ?

languages.text: "Möchtet Ihr nicht zu Eurer Familie zurückkehren? Um sicherzugehen, dass die Werserian keinen weiteren Anschuldigungen zum Opfer fallen?"
languages.original_text: "Don't you wish to return to your family? To make sure the Werserians do not fall victim to any further accusations?"

traits.locale_text: "Möchtet Ihr nicht zu Eurer Familie zurückkehren? Um sicherzugehen, dass die Werserian keinen weiteren Anschuldigungen zum Opfer fallen?"

languages.text: "Ailenin yanına dönmek istemiyor musun? Werserian hanesinin başka iftiralara maruz kalmasına izin mi vereceksin?"
languages.original_text: "Don't you wish to return to your family? To make sure the Werserians do not fall victim to any further accusations?"

traits.locale_text: "Ailenin yanına dönmek istemiyor musun? Werserian hanesinin başka iftiralara maruz kalmasına izin mi vereceksin?"
